casestable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `customopener`.`cases` (`type` TEXT NOT NULL , `name` TEXT NOT NULL , `id` TEXT NOT NULL , `iconURL` TEXT NOT NULL , `tag` TEXT NOT NULL , `baseColor` TEXT NOT NULL , `showKnives` INT NOT NULL , `showPercent` INT NOT NULL , `minimalVersion` TEXT NOT NULL , `platforms` TEXT NOT NULL , `endTime` INT NOT NULL , `sideBanner` TEXT NOT NULL , `sideBannerTarget` TEXT NOT NULL , `cornerLabel` TEXT NOT NULL , `premium_only` INT NOT NULL , `trialAvailable` INT NOT NULL , `skins` TEXT NOT NULL ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
devicetable: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `customopener`.`deviceinfo` (`playerID` TEXT NOT NULL , `token` TEXT NOT NULL , `uuid` TEXT NOT NULL , `isRooted` INT NOT NULL , `deviceModel` TEXT NOT NULL , `os` TEXT NOT NULL , `language` TEXT NOT NULL ) ENGINE = InnoDB;
